comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: I think that these houses were along one of the streets in Gambles Hill, perhaps Byrd street as it headed down the hill towards where the FRB is today. Gambles Hill had some of the worst-kept buildings and houses in Richmond before it was essentially cleared out for offices and parking lots in the late 1950's.
